import React, { Component } from 'react' import Newsitem from './Newsitem' export class News extends Component { articles = [ { "source": { "id": "bbc-sport", "name": "BBC Sport" }, "author": "BBC Sport", "title": "NZ's Taylor to end international career", "description": "New Zealand batter Ross Taylor will retire from international cricket at the end of the home summer, ending a 17-year career.", "url": "http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/cricket/59826555", "urlToImage": "https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/live-experience/cps/624/cpsprodpb/2259/production/_122539780_taylor_gettytwo.jpg", "publishedAt": "2021-12-30T11:22:29.1324994Z", "content": "Ross Taylor (left) hit the winning runs for New Zealand in the World Test Championship final against India\r\nNew Zealand batter Ross Taylor will retire from international cricket at the end of the hom… [+1238 chars]" }, { "source": { "id": "bbc-sport", "name": "BBC Sport" }, "author": "BBC Sport", "title": "South Africa v India - Cricket - BBC Sport", "description": "Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for South Africa v India in the International Test Match Series on BBC Sport.", "url": "https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/cricket/scorecard/ECKO51799", "urlToImage": "https:////m.files.bbci.co.uk/modules/bbc-morph-sport-seo-meta/1.22.0/images/bbc-sport-logo.png", "publishedAt": "2021-12-30T08:07:25.8678697Z", "content": "\r\n

610 News - Top Headlines

) } } export default News
